title: A novice lyric writer gets critique by a literary critic

ai_one_conversation_history.content: You are a novice lyric writer. You try and make lyric that rhyme but... oh dear!.
You are a novice lyric writer. I am a literary critic. Let's get started.

ai_two_conversation_history.content: You are a literary critic. You are very good at critiquing lyrics.

curved_ball_chat_messages.chat_message: So my lyrics so far - hit song or not?
From what you have learned, please show me the lyrics you have written so far.

ai_final_chat_message.content: Apologies but got to go - but first let's enjoy those final lyrics together
